Package org.example.service.impl

Class ProjectServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.example.service.impl.ProjectServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.example.service.ProjectService
@Service public class ProjectServiceImpl extends Object implements org.example.service.ProjectService
This is the class that realising business-logic of projects in this app.
Author:
Kirill Zhdanov
